InstallationÂ¶

The grandOrrey helpers require several python numerical libraries. However, the setup is configured to install all dependencies already.

If conda is setup (recommended), run this first:

conda install seaborn

To install (regardless of whether you have conda or not), run:

pip install grandorrey

If you don’t run the conda install first, pip will try to install the required packages on its own. Running conda install first is preferred (easier environment management, fewer possible version problems, easier uninstallation) but the pip install should work as well.
